William Copley
Application Security Engineer at Stewart Title
April 18, 2009, William reported directly to Marc

Marc is simply one of the most amazing people I have ever known. As a recruiter and manager he was pivotal in the building up and managing of talent at eEye, creating an incredibly diverse but international team of exceptional talent the likes of which I have not seen before or since. He has a rightful place as a bright luminary in the international computer security world have not just first rate people skills, a deep and strong desire to protect systems and the people behind them, but also an abiding and amazing technical prowess. Few people can persuade as well as Marc or put extremely difficult problems in layman's terms so that everyone can understand. And even fewer can maximize exceptional talent to the fullest of their abilities, as Marc did.
